prTitle: Add create action items context menu feature
prDescription:
**New Feature: Create Action Items**

Extract actionable tasks from selected text using AI-powered analysis.

**How to use:**
- Select text in any note
- Right-click and choose "Create Action Items" from the context menu
- Choose format: checkboxes (- [ ]) or bullets (- )

**Features:**
- AI-powered action item extraction using VS Code LLM API
- Two format options: checkboxes for task tracking, bullets for simple lists
- Inserts action items below your selection with "## Action Items" header
- Smart detection - shows message when no actionable content is found

**Technical Details:**
- New ActionItemsService for AI-powered extraction
- Integrated into Noted editor context menu
- Uses GitHub Copilot (gpt-4o) for intelligent parsing
